comments.body: They list a different link on PyPI, but I like this one better if we are to have one.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +35,39 @@    regular expressions. The pyparsing module provides a library of classes
    that client code uses to construct the grammar directly in Python code.
  doc_url: http://pyparsing.wikispaces.com/Documentation
  dev_url: https://svn.code.sf.net/p/pyparsing/code/

comments.body: nit: Sorry, the mixture of 2-space and 4-space indenting feels off. Could we please either make this match the rest or the other way around. No preference either way.
